initial.comments: skips the finalize screen where the user chooses to save as incomplete or finalized and instead saves as finalized

display.text: Aboveground Storage Tanks and Separation Equipment
Tank surface, supports, bolts, rivets, seams and/ or gaskets show signs of damage, rust, deterioration or leakage
Aboveground tank foundation and/ or secondary containment berm has eroded or settled, or has been breached
Containment berm shows discoloration or stains
Aboveground tank interstice contains liquid (applicable to ASTs with double wall spaces).
Level gauges, electronic monitoring equipment and/ or overfill protection alarms are faulty and/or inoperative
Vent pipes are uncapped and/ or obstructed.
Thief hatch and vent valve does not seal air tight
Tank area blocked by trash, equipment or vegetation
Equipment protectors, labels, or signs are missing
Spill bucket is cracked, damaged and/or has product or debris.
Supply/ return lines and/ or supports, gaskets or valve seals are damaged, deteriorated and/ or show signs leakage.
Loading/unloading lines are damaged or deteriorated.
Connections are not capped or blank flanged
Secondary containment is damaged or stained
Spill response material missing or needs replacement
Spill/ threat of a release reporting procedures with emergency contacts are not conspicuously posted
